name: Home
title: Home
paragraphs: This website serves as a home page for testing various ideas developed using Solid JS. The content presented here may undergo periodic changes as I continue to experiment with different concepts and functionalities.

For potential employers, I am actively seeking opportunities in the field of software and website development. Interested parties are welcome to connect with me through my LinkedIn profile for further discussions.
Additionally, the source code for this site is accessible via my GitHub repository, providing insight into my coding practices and project structure.

name: About
title: About Me
paragraphs: I am a BSc (Hons) graduate who has been confident working with computers in some way for most of my life.

With 14 years of experience in software and web development, I have primarily focused on PHP, while also utilizing JavaScript on various occasions. My expertise encompasses a comprehensive understanding of version control systems, particularly Git, and proficiency in managing MySQL databases.

Throughout my career, I have gained experience with multiple frameworks and libraries, notably:
  • Laravel and Symfony for PHP, which enhances the development of robust applications.
  • React and SolidJS for JavaScript, allowing for the creation of dynamic user interfaces.
This diverse skill set positions me well for contributing to complex projects in the software development landscape.

name: Interests
title: My Interests
paragraphs: In addition to my professional commitments, I engage in developing new coding ideas as a hobby during my spare time. This pursuit not only allows me to explore innovative concepts but also enables me to stay informed about emerging programming languages and technologies.

Furthermore, I maintain an active interest in music. I play several musical instruments, with the guitar being my primary focus. My passion for music has led me to create original compositions, some of which I have shared on YouTube. This platform serves as a means for me to express my creativity and connect with others who share similar interests.
Through these hobbies, I continue to enhance my skills and broaden my horizons in both technology and the arts.

name: FAQ
title: Some Questions Answered
html:
Why does this site exist?

It is simply a place for me to test ideas and new concepts as I learn them.

Why is this site made using JavaScript?

This gives me the opportunity to see the differences between making a site in JavaScript and making one in PHP.
